page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION ON FORD
page.content: Our block is in the county of { {SHROPSHIRE}near {SHREWSBURY}.It is centred on the biggest village,{FORD, in the valley of the{River Severn.}It has a population of about 400-500 people.The church in {FORD }is called St. Michael's.There is also a church in {MONTFORD},the other village in the block.{ {FORD}has a private clinic,several old mansion-type houses,2 shops,a Primary School,many farms dispersed in the block and some recent Council housing.The{A458 Shrewsbury }to {Welshpool} road divides the block.There is a disused railway line crossing the main road. A bus service travels to the main towns. The River Severn runs to the North and parallel to the{A458,}and {FORD }lies in between.
